nodes.text: The concealed dart launcher was a type of dart shooter usually worn on the wrist and concealed by clothing.

The concealed dart launcher fired toxic darts filled a potent sedative designed to incapacitate a target. However it could also be filled with other types of poisons. Because of its compact design, a concealed dart launcher was difficult to detect. Owning this weapon was illegal in all but specific, highly regulated circumstances.
Deliah Blue often used a concealed dart launcher to bring down her targets quickly and without causing lethal damage.
In 137 ABY while on a bounty hunting mission, Deliah Blue used her dart launcher during an encounter with a Bothan Jedi named Hosk Trey'lis.
